snippet.title: Kingdom Hearts HD 1.5 Remix Launch Trailer
snippet.description: The worlds. The characters. The magic. The classic RPG returns in sizzling HD to open the doors of Kingdom Hearts for a new generation of gamer. Experience the revolutionary union between Disney classics and Final Fantasy icons in this collection of Final Mix, Re: Chain of Memories, and the cutscenes from 358/2 Days.
